import React, { useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { CreateProfile as createProfilAction } from '../../actions/Profile_action'; const CreateProfile = ({ createProfilAction }) => { const [displaySocialInputs, setDisplaySocialInputs] = useState(false); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '', }); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData; console.log(formData); const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return ( <>

onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs && ( <>

); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = { createProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; export default connect(mapStateToProps, { createProfilAction })(CreateProfile);
